QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Bilirubin - urine
QAPair.Answer: Bilirubin is a yellowish pigment found in bile , which is a fluid produced by the liver and stored in the gallbladder. This article is about a lab test to measure the amount of bilirubin in the urine. Large amounts of bilirubin in the body can lead to jaundice or yellowing of the skin. Bilirubin may also be measured with a blood test.
